attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Sets whether the component is disabled.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: category
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0303.

attrs.name: fetchHrapprover
attrs.desc: Customize the interface for obtaining approver information. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used. Other customized attributes are the same as those of the dept component.
